mapper.select:
SELECT MDI_LINKNO, MDI_DPTNAME, CMN_DEL_STS, CMN_MAK_ID, CMN_MAK_DATE FROM MF_DPT_INFO WHERE CMN_DEL_STS = 'N'
AND MDI_DPTNAME LIKE '%' || #{schKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY MDI_LINKNO

SELECT A.MTI_TEAMNO, A.MTI_TEAMNAME, A.MTI_DPTNO, B.MDI_LINKNO, B.MDI_DPTNAME FROM MF_DPT_INFO B, MF_TEAM_INFO A WHERE A.MTI_DPTNO = B.MDI_LINKNO AND A.CMN_DEL_STS = 'N'
AND A.MTI_DPTNO = #{dptno}
AND A.MTI_TEAMNAME LIKE '%' || #{schKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY A.MTI_TEAMNO, B.MDI_LINKNO

SELECT A.MUI_ID, A.MUI_TEAMNO, A.MUI_NAME, A.MUI_DPTLVLCODE, A.MUI_DPTLVLNAME, A.MUI_DPTPOSITCODE, A.MUI_DPTPOSITNAME, A.MUI_OFFCTELNO, A.MUI_JCCODE, A.MUI_HPTELNO, A.MUI_LINCNO, A.MUI_MAINBIZ, A.MUI_LGKEYSET, A.CMN_DEL_STS, A.CMN_MAK_DATE, A.CMN_MAK_PROG, A.CMN_MAK_ID, A.CMN_UPD_DATE, A.CMN_UPD_PROG, A.CMN_UPD_ID FROM MF_USER_INFO A WHERE A.CMN_DEL_STS = 'N'
AND A.MUI_TEAMNO = #{team_no}
AND A.MUI_NAME LIKE '%' || #{schKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY MUI_JCCODE ASC

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT A.* ,(SELECT MDI_DPTNAME FROM MF_DPT_INFO WHERE MDI_LINKNO = A.MTI_DPTNO) MDI_DPTNAME ,(SELECT MTI_TEAMNAME FROM MF_TEAM_INFO WHERE MTI_TEAMNO = A.MUI_TEAMNO) MTI_TEAMNAME ,(SELECT MAG_GRPCODE FROM MF_AUTH_GRP WHERE MAG_ID = A.MUI_ID) MAG_GRPCODE ,A.MSU_USERID || ' (' || A.MUI_ID || ')' AS TXT_ID FROM ( SELECT UI.MUI_ID, UI.MUI_TEAMNO, UI.MUI_NAME, UI.MUI_DPTLVLCODE, UI.MUI_DPTLVLNAME, UI.MUI_DPTPOSITCODE, UI.MUI_DPTPOSITNAME, UI.MUI_OFFCTELNO, UI.MUI_JCCODE, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name('100','100',UI.MUI_JCCode) AS TXT_MUI_JCCODE, UI.MUI_HPTELNO, UI.MUI_LINCNO, UI.MUI_MAINBIZ, UI.MUI_LGKEYSET, SU.MSU_USERID, SU.MSU_ID, SU.MSU_PWD, SU.MSU_PMSLVL, SU.MSU_APRV_YN, SU.CMN_DEL_STS, SU.CMN_MAK_DATE, SU.CMN_MAK_PROG, SU.CMN_MAK_ID, SU.CMN_UPD_DATE, SU.CMN_UPD_PROG, SU.CMN_UPD_ID ,(SELECT MTI_DPTNO FROM MF_TEAM_INFO WHERE MTI_TEAMNO = UI.MUI_TEAMNO) MTI_DPTNO FROM MF_USER_INFO UI, MF_SYS_USER SU WHERE UI.MUI_ID = SU.MSU_ID(+) AND UI.MUI_ID = #{mui_id} ) A ) A
mapper.update: MERGE INTO MF_AUTH_GRP T USING ( SELECT #{mag_id} AS MAG_ID, #{mag_grpcode} AS MAG_GRPCODE FROM DUAL ) S ON ( T.MAG_ID = S.MAG_ID ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET MAG_GRPCODE = #{mag_grpcode} , CMN_UPD_PROG = 'saveUser' , CMN_UPD_ID = #{ss_userid} , CMN_UPD_DATE = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( MAG_ID, MAG_GRPCODE, MAG_ST_DAY, MAG_ED_DAY , CMN_DEL_STS, CMN_MAK_ID, CMN_MAK_DATE) VALUES (S.MAG_ID,S.MAG_GRPCODE, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), '99991231' ,'N',#{ss_userid},SYSDATE)

UPDATE MF_USER_INFO SET MUI_TEAMNO = #{mui_teamno}, MUI_JCCODE = #{mui_jccode}, MUI_HPTELNO = #{mui_hptelno}, MUI_LINCNO = #{mui_lincno}, MUI_MAINBIZ = #{mui_mainbiz}, CMN_UPD_DATE = SYSDATE, CMN_UPD_PROG = 'updateUserInfo', CMN_UPD_ID = #{ss_userid} WHERE MUI_ID = #{mui_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MF_USER_PMS A WHERE MUP_USERID = #{mag_id} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM MF_COMM_CODE WHERE MCC_L_CODE = 'MENU01' AND A.MUP_PROGID = MCC_S_CODE )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MF_USER_PMS ( MUP_USERID, MUP_PROGID, MUP_UPDLVL, CMN_DEL_STS, CMN_MAK_DATE, CMN_MAK_PROG, CMN_MAK_ID ) SELECT #{mag_id}, MCC_S_CODE, '1' MUP_UPDLVL, 'N', SYSDATE, 'insertUserPms', #{ss_userid} FROM ( SELECT MCC_S_CODE, 'AM' GRPCODE FROM MF_COMM_CODE WHERE MCC_L_CODE = 'MENU01' AND MCC_S_CODE IN ('0106','0107') UNION ALL SELECT MCC_S_CODE, 'HW' GRPCODE FROM MF_COMM_CODE WHERE MCC_L_CODE = 'MENU01' AND MCC_S_CODE IN ('0201','0202') UNION ALL SELECT MCC_S_CODE, 'SW' GRPCODE FROM MF_COMM_CODE WHERE MCC_L_CODE = 'MENU01' AND MCC_S_CODE IN ('0107','0201','0202') UNION ALL SELECT MCC_S_CODE, 'SM' GRPCODE FROM MF_COMM_CODE WHERE MCC_L_CODE = 'MENU01' AND MCC_S_CODE IN ('0105','0107','0201','0202') UNION ALL SELECT MCC_S_CODE, 'JW' GRPCODE FROM MF_COMM_CODE WHERE MCC_L_CODE = 'MENU01' AND MCC_S_CODE IN ('0106','0107','0108','0109','0110','0111','0201','0202','0303','0401','0402','0403','0404','0405','0502','0503','0701','0702') UNION ALL SELECT MCC_S_CODE, 'BW' GRPCODE FROM MF_COMM_CODE WHERE MCC_L_CODE = 'MENU01' AND MCC_S_CODE IN ('0108','0109','0110','0201','0202','0401','0403','0404','0501','0502','0503') UNION ALL SELECT MCC_S_CODE, 'MM' GRPCODE FROM MF_COMM_CODE WHERE MCC_L_CODE = 'MENU01' AND MCC_S_CODE IN ('0201','0202') UNION ALL SELECT MCC_S_CODE, 'MU' GRPCODE FROM MF_COMM_CODE WHERE MCC_L_CODE = 'MENU01' AND MCC_S_CODE IN ('0201','0202') ) WHERE GRPCODE=#{mag_grpcode}
mapper.select: SELECT A.* ,(SELECT MDI_DPTNAME FROM MF_DPT_INFO WHERE MDI_LINKNO = A.MTI_DPTNO) AS MDI_DPTNAME FROM ( SELECT MUK_USERID, MUK_KJID, MUK_RCVTYPE, MUK_KJSEQ, MUI_NAME, FN_GETCOMCODE_CLS3NAME ('100', '100', MUI_JCCODE) TXT_MUI_JCCODE, (SELECT MTI_DPTNO FROM MF_TEAM_INFO WHERE MTI_TEAMNO = UI.MUI_TEAMNO) AS MTI_DPTNO, (SELECT MTI_TEAMNAME FROM MF_TEAM_INFO WHERE MTI_TEAMNO = UI.MUI_TEAMNO) AS MTI_TEAMNAME FROM MF_USER_KJP UK, MF_USER_INFO UI WHERE UK.MUK_KJID = UI.MUI_ID AND UK.CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' AND UK.MUK_RCVTYPE = #{muk_rcvtype} AND UK.MUK_USERID = #{muk_userid} ) A
